meanings.sent1: She wheelbarrowed the heavy rocks to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The gardener wheelbarrowed the soil to the flower beds.
meanings.sent3: The kids wheelbarrowed their toys around the backyard for fun.
meanings.sent4: He wheelbarrowed his emotions carefully, not wanting to spill any.
meanings.sent5: The image of her wheelbarrowing the groceries home stuck in his mind.
